```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

# Cigan

```{r}
results <- read_csv("results-perf.csv", col_types = "n-f--n-lfffl")

results <- results %>%
    group_by(counter, cdcl, adjacency, clause, decision) %>%
    summarize(value = mean(value), ratio = mean(ratio), .groups = "keep")

results %>%
    filter(!cdcl, adjacency == "list", decision == "trivial") %>%
    ggplot(aes(fill = counter, x = value, y = clause)) + 
    geom_bar(position = "dodge", stat = "identity")

results %>%
    filter(cdcl, adjacency == "set", decision == "trivial") %>%
    ggplot(aes(fill = counter, x = value, y = clause)) + 
    geom_bar(position = "dodge", stat = "identity")
```
